translation.zh: 有没有…？有卫生间吗？这里…？

translation.en: -In the outside, is there a bathroom? -We're actually live.
translation.zh: 外面有卫生间吗？ 我们在现场直播

translation.en: But this is also live and I gotta make it happen.
translation.zh: 但我现在真的想上厕所

translation.en: I get-- Is there--?
I've got to just-- Excuse me.
No, no.
-[Sam] This is bad. This is very bad. -Alison, is that him running?
translation.zh:
-糟糕 真是太糟了
-艾莉森 他在跑吗？

translation.en: Taxi! Taxi!
And now he's apparently getting into a cab.
translation.zh: 显然他现在上了一辆出租车

translation.en: You know how many books this is gonna sell?
translation.zh: 知道这下能卖出多少书吗？

translation.en: Go, go, go.
Just keep on driving, please, fast.
translation.zh: 麻烦你一直开 快点

translation.en: Can you go?
Can you pass him?
Okay.
[in Spanish] He's here.
-Oh, God. -[gun cocks]
Hello?
Is that blood?
Hey... there seems to be some kind of mistake here.
I don't think there has...
Mason Carver.
Oh, no. Oh, no. There definitely has. Um...
translation.zh: 不 这肯定是场误会

translation.en: -Mason Carver, he's not real. -[El Toro] No.
But the Ghost, he is very real.
translation.zh: 但是幽灵是真实存在的

translation.en: Although I did imagine you to be a bit...
you know... longer.
-You're pro-dem guerillas. -Yes.
I'm in Venezuela.
Very good.
But I'm not the Ghost.
Of course you're not, eh? [laughs]
I am El Toro.
Although you already knew that.
Just like you knew that there was a Venezuelan general
translation.zh: 正如你知道有一位委内瑞拉的将军

translation.en: that was assassinated by a sniper in the late '80s.
translation.zh:
在1980年代末
被狙击手刺杀了一样

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no.
See, I changed that for the book.
translation.zh: 听我说 我的书里把这个内容改了

translation.en: [stammers] He was actually poisoned.
He was. Which is something only the Ghost would know.
translation.zh: 没错 这只有幽灵本人知道

translation.en: Oh, God. [sobs]
Thank you.
My hands were getting all numb and prickly.
You know, the needles. But please, you've got to understand.
translation.zh: 被绳子捆的 请你一定要明白

translation.en: I'm a writer, you know, who does lots of research.
translation.zh: 我是个作家 会查很多资料

translation.en: But I'm not-- I'm not the Ghost.
Exactly... what the Ghost would say.
-[all laugh] -I promise you, you've got the wrong guy.
translation.zh: 我发誓 你们抓错人了

translation.en: You know how I know that you are the Ghost, my friend?
translation.zh:
你知道我是怎么知道
你是幽灵的吗 朋友？

translation.en: [El Toro] Because if you're not...
I will kill you.
I will cut you slowly and painfully with my knife.
translation.zh: 我会用刀一点点折磨死你

translation.en: So painfully...
that your innards will fall out and spill out on the floor.
translation.zh: 你的内脏会流出来 淌到地上

translation.en: Then I will grab them and place them on your chest.
translation.zh: 我会把它们抓起来 放在你的胸口

translation.en: And then I will place your hands over them like that.
translation.zh: 然后我会把你的手放在它们上面

translation.en: Something I like to call the Venezuelan embrace.
translation.zh: 我称它为委内瑞拉式环抱

translation.en: I am him.
-I am the Ghost. -I knew it.
So, what can I do for you?
[El Toro] Mm. You, my friend...
You are going to kill the president of Venezuela.
translation.zh: 你要去刺杀委内瑞拉总统

translation.en: [El Toro] In two days, our so-called president
translation.zh: 两天后 我们所谓的总统

translation.en: will throw himself an inauguration ball to celebrate his fifth unelected term.
translation.zh:
会为自己办一场就职典礼
庆祝他第五次非选举连任

translation.en: And there, you will take his life.
translation.zh: 你就在那里取他的性命

translation.en: And in doing so, you will send a message to the people
that greed and corruption will not be tolerated.
translation.zh: 人民无法容忍贪污腐败

translation.en: And that the revolution has begun.
I understand completely.
It just seems you've got quite a few resources here.
Wow, is that a 50 cal-- Yeah, that's a 50 cal.
translation.zh: 那是50口径的…对 没错

translation.en: Um, why not do it yourself?
Because not even I could reach the man in his palace.
translation.zh: 因为我进不去他的府邸

translation.en: For that, I need someone with your unique talents.
translation.zh: 所以我需要你这种有独特才能的人

translation.en: Right. First step would be reconnaissance.
Uh, I would need a vehicle and a map clearly indicating
translation.zh: 我要一辆车 一张地图 标明

translation.en: -where the nearest airport is located. -Whoa, whoa, whoa.
Why would you need that?
Because once it's done...
um, I'll have less than 90 minutes to leave the country.
translation.zh: 我只有不到90分钟的时间离开这里

translation.en: Out of the country?
-When it's done. -Ninety minutes.
Okay, you're right. You will need a car.
translation.zh: 好 你说得对 你需要车

translation.en: And a driver, my second in command.
translation.zh: 还需要司机 这是我的副指挥官

translation.en: [El Toro] Psst. Oye, drive him.
Nice to meet you.
You are not the Ghost.
-He is the Ghost, Juan. He's the Ghost. -He's not the Ghost.
And when I prove it...
I'm gonna kill him myself.
I must apologize for Juan.
He's a bit of a wet blanket.
Good luck.
[Cleveland] That idiot is dead.
[agent] So incredibly dead.
Voice analysis is back.
Name's Samuel Larson.
He published a book claiming to be, get this... an international assassin.
translation.zh: 他出版了一本书 称自己是国际刺客

translation.en: We should probably pull him out, put him on a plane home.
translation.zh:
我们应该把他救出来
派飞机把他接回国

translation.en: Why the hell would we do that?
Because we're the CIA.
translation.zh: 因为我们是中情局特工

translation.en: -You almost got me. You almost got me. -You know I like messing with you, man.
translation.zh: 你差点骗到我 你知道我爱和你开玩笑

translation.en: I didn't know where you were going with that.
translation.zh: 我真没反应过来你的意思

translation.en: Bet you a Benji he's dead in less than 48.
translation.zh:
赌100美元
不出48小时他就会死

translation.en: Double he doesn't make it to breakfast.
translation.zh: 赌200美元 他撑不过明早

translation.en: Yeah.
Come on. From here you do your reconnaissance.
translation.zh: 快走 从这里开始侦查吧

translation.en: So, I guess I should get started. Uh...
So, I will see you in probably a few hours, I guess.
translation.zh: 我们大概几个小时后再见

translation.en: Where you go, I follow.
Look. We seem to have gotten off on the wrong foot.
translation.zh: 我们的最初印象好像不太好

translation.en: No, I'm on the right foot. The foot of you are not the Ghost.
translation.zh: 没有 我只是觉得你不是幽灵

translation.en: What makes you so sure?
The Ghost would never have been kidnapped so easily.
translation.zh: 幽灵不会这么轻易被人绑架

translation.en: That's a fair point. But you know, maybe I wanted to be kidnapped.
translation.zh: 有道理 也许我是故意被你们绑来的

translation.en: Or maybe you're a fraud. And a liar.
translation.zh: 也许你是个骗子 你在撒谎

translation.en: And maybe I kill you right now.
So, what is the Ghost gonna do?
translation.zh: 幽灵 你打算怎么办？

translation.en: That's a good question.
So?
What is the Ghost gonna do?
He's gonna pee. I got to pee.
translation.zh: 他会吓尿 我想上厕所

translation.en: -Around the corner, to the right. -Gotcha.
Open up.
Open up.
[Juan] Güero, open the door.
Damn.
-[Sam] They're gonna kill the president. -[detective] Who is?
Pro-dem guerrillas. El Toro.
translation.zh: 民主游击队的人 艾尔塔罗

translation.en: -They tried to hire me. -They tried to hire you?
translation.zh:
-他们想雇我杀人
-他们想雇你？

translation.en: Yeah, but not the real me.
The fake me from my book, True Memoirs of an International Assassin.
translation.zh:
是我的书
《国际刺客真实回忆录》中虚构的我

translation.en: If that is the fake you, then why does it say "true" in the title?
translation.zh:
既然是虚构的
题目为什么要写真实二字？

translation.en: -It's just to sell more books. -So, can you show me a copy?
translation.zh:
-为了提高销量
-能让我看看吗？

translation.en: [stammers] You got a computer?
-The computer's not working today. -You don't have one working computer?
translation.zh:
-电脑今天坏了
-你们连一台能用的电脑都没有？

translation.en: -You don't have one copy of your book? -It's a virtual book.
translation.zh:
-你连自己的书都没有？
-我的书是虚拟书

translation.en: -Ah, then it's not a real book. -No, it's real. It's real, okay?
translation.zh:
-书根本不存在
-不 是真实存在的 好吗？

translation.en: It's just online.
It could be the next-- Do you know Twilight?
translation.zh:
可能成为《暮光之城》第二
你知道那书吗？

translation.en: -Oh, I know Twilight. -It could be the next Twilight...
translation.zh:
-我知道
-它会成为下一个《暮光之城》

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Can you just take me to the embassy?
This doesn't look like the embassy.
translation.zh: 这里看起来不像大使馆

translation.en: It's not the real embassy, no.
[detective] You sit here.
-Make yourself comfortable. -[officer in Spanish] I'm calling him.
translation.zh: 别客气 我给他打电话

translation.en: He says El Toro hired him to kill the president.
translation.zh: 他说艾尔塔罗雇他刺杀总统

translation.en: [in English] We--? We gonna be here long?
translation.zh: 我们…？我们要在这待很久吗？

translation.en: [in Spanish] Masovich wants to see him at his house in half an hour.
translation.zh: 马索维克要半小时后在他家见他

translation.en: [in Spanish] He doesn't pay me well enough to be at his beck and call.
translation.zh:
他没付我多少钱
还想要我对他言听计从

translation.en: [officer] You want to tell him that?
We'll take him to Masovich.
translation.zh: 我们会带他去见马索维克

translation.en: But not before this gringo gives me a much-deserved bonus.
translation.zh: 我得先从这个外国佬身上敲上一笔

translation.en: [in English] Okay.
You need to get me some money.
Some next-Twilight-sized money.
translation.zh:
给我与你的下一个
《暮光之城》 一样的书等价的钱

translation.en: -Yello. -[Sam over phone] Kylie. Hi, it's Sam.
translation.zh:
-你好
-凯丽 你好 我是山姆

translation.en: Ghost with the most. What's the word?
translation.zh: 最受欢迎的幽灵先生 什么事？

translation.en: -[Sam] I'm in Venezuela. -Sure you are.
[Kylie] I'm doing that eyebrow thing right now, BTdubs.
translation.zh: 我又在挑眉毛了 顺便说一句

translation.en: I'm telling the truth.
Uh... I've been abducted. Twice.
Oh, you are so method. I love it.
Can't wait to find out what the Ghost does.
translation.zh: 我很想知道幽灵会怎样脱困

translation.en: Oh, got to go. That's me. I'm Curtis.
translation.zh: 先挂了 是我的 我是柯蒂斯

translation.en: Nothing, I--
-I got nothing. -No.
I need to hear about a large sum of money.
Or your face is going to be nothing
-in three, two, one-- -No. Come on, please. No, no, no.
translation.zh:
-三 二 一
-别这样 别杀他

translation.en: -Let's light this candle. -[detective] Whoa, what are you doing?
-What was that? -I didn't-- I don't know.
-[Sam] Ow! That hurt. Oh, that hurt. -This is going to hurt more.
[Sam] No. No, please, no.
[Sam shouts indistinctly] No!
Get a move on, cupcake.
I'm sorry. Who are you?
Rosa Bolivar. DEA.
translation.zh: 我叫罗莎波利娃 是缉毒局特工

translation.en: I've been trailing those cops for two weeks.
translation.zh: 过去两周我一直在跟踪那几个警察

translation.en: They're on the payroll for a heroin-smuggling Russian
translation.zh:
他们一直收钱
帮俄罗斯海洛因走私犯

translation.en: named Anton Masovich.
Who's that?
A heroin-smuggling Russian-- Did you not hear what I said?
translation.zh:
俄国海洛因走私…
你没听见我刚才说的吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry. Okay, look.
Thank you for saving me.
I don't do this job for thanks.
translation.zh: 我救你不是为了要你的谢谢

translation.en: That's a good signature line.
Why does El Toro think you can kill the president?
translation.zh: 为什么艾尔塔罗认为你能刺杀总统？

translation.en: It's just a misunderstanding.
I'm a writer. I create characters.
translation.zh: 我是名作家 我创作小说人物

translation.en: -This right here is not me. -What's your name?
translation.zh: 我不是什么刺客 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: My name is Sam.
[sighs] I'll tell you what, Sam and cheese.
translation.zh: 听我说 山姆大奶酪

translation.en: -I'm gonna get you out of this. -Thank God. Thank you very much.
translation.zh:
-我会帮你脱困
-太好了 非常感谢

translation.en: You're gonna do me a favor first.
Anything you need.
-Meet with Masovich. -That's not gonna happen.
Your friends there told Masovich that you would be at his place in 15.
translation.zh:
你那两个朋友跟马索维克说
15分钟内会送你到他家

translation.en: If you don't show, he's gonna know something's up.
translation.zh: 你如果不去 他就会察觉

translation.en: What does he want with me?
That's what you need to find out, honey baked.
translation.zh: 这个你要自己去查了 甜心

translation.en: [whispers] Honey baked?
It's that one with the huge gate.
I'm not going in there. The one with the guards?
translation.zh: 我不要进去 那里有人看守

translation.en: Is that a Doberman? They've got Dobermans walking around, no.
translation.zh: 那是杜宾犬吗？有杜宾犬守门 不去

translation.en: I'm not gonna be buried in Venezuela. I'm not going in.
translation.zh: 我不要葬身在委内瑞拉 我不去

translation.en: If I go in, I will be murdered in the face.
translation.zh: 我要是去了 会被杀掉

translation.en: Look at me.
-Breathe. -I'm breathing.
Not like you're drowning.
Slow it down.
Breathe.
If Masovich wanted you dead,
he would have ordered those cops to execute you.
translation.zh: 他早就让那两个警察动手了

translation.en: He didn't. They were going off-script
translation.zh: 他没有 他们的算盘落空了

translation.en: when they started shaking you down for money.
Find out Masovich's interest in El Toro and the president,
translation.zh:
查出马索维克
跟艾尔塔罗和总统之间的关系

translation.en: and I'll get you home safely.
translation.zh: 之后我会让你安全地回家

translation.en: Masovich needs to believe you are an assassin.
translation.zh: 要让马索维克相信你是个刺客

translation.en: Oh, I'm so gonna die.
I'm so gonna die.
-[man speaking Spanish over intercom] -[in Spanish] Detective Garcia sent me.
translation.zh: 是加西亚警探派我来的

translation.en: I'm Anton Masovich.
Come outside.
It's a beautiful day.
How about a nice cold Zima?
You like?
They are fun girls, huh?
Yeah, I can tell by all the splashing.
translation.zh: 是 看她们玩水心情好极了

translation.en: When this is over, you can have whichever one you like.
translation.zh: 事情办完 喜欢哪个你随便选

translation.en: What do you mean, when this is over?
[Anton on microphone] Take a seat.
How are you connected to El Toro?
The truth.
El Toro wants me to kill the president.
translation.zh: 艾尔塔罗要我刺杀总统

translation.en: He thinks I'm an international assassin.
-And? Are you? -No. Not even close.
translation.zh: 然后呢？你是吗？ 不是

translation.en: [Paolo] I'm sorry, Mr. Masovich.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 马索维克先生

translation.en: The Zima shipment was delayed.
I've brought you Smirnoff Ice.
translation.zh: 我为您准备了司木露冰

translation.en: [Anton] Don't worry about it, Paolo.
Why they only sell Zima in Japan is beyond me.
translation.zh:
为什么他们只在日本卖吉马
这不是我能决定的

translation.en: Am I right?
You are. I mean, I just-- I totally agree.
I mean, if you wanna be global, you've gotta be accessible.
translation.zh: 想做成全球化品牌 就得方便购买

translation.en: You gotta be, you know, you gotta be able to reach out, Paolo.
translation.zh: 要让人买得到才行 保罗

translation.en: I'm blessed to be kept swimming, most of the time.
translation.zh:
我很幸运 能继续游泳
在多数情况下

translation.en: El Toro is a terrorist who's brainwashed his followers.
translation.zh:
艾尔塔罗是个恐怖分子
他的追随者都被他洗脑了

translation.en: He's a major concern to my business interests in this country.
translation.zh: 他妨碍我在这个国家做生意赚钱

translation.en: I've tried to flip his men in the past, but they'd rather die on the sword.
translation.zh:
我想让他的手下替我做事
但他们宁可被砍死也不愿意

translation.en: What about you?
-What about me? -Do you wanna die on the sword?
No, no, no.
I don't want to die on the sword, or, like, on anything else.
translation.zh: 我不想被砍死 我不想死

translation.en: -I don't-- -Wonderful.
Then you kill him for me.
translation.zh: 既然如此 你替我杀了他

translation.en: I'm sorry, what?
Kill El Toro.
He trusts you,
-so, you can get close to him. -Yeah, but I'm not an assassin.
translation.zh:
-你能接近他
-是 可我不是刺客

translation.en: So you keep saying. But you clearly have the skills.
translation.zh: 你一直否认 但显然你很有能力

translation.en: You disabled Detective Garcia, and you came here.
translation.zh: 你制服了加西亚警探 来到了我这里

translation.en: Which suggests to me that you are sure of yourself.
translation.zh: 这就说明你非常有自信

translation.en: I promise, I'm not sure of myself. When they ask paper or plastic,
translation.zh:
我发誓我没自信
刚才他们问我要纸杯还是塑料杯

translation.en: I'm even like, "Whatever's easiest for you," you know?
translation.zh: 我还说“哪个方便就拿哪个”呢

translation.en: -[speaking Spanish] ¿No habla inglés? -Yeah, your modesty doesn't fool me.
translation.zh: 我不会被你的谦逊所骗

translation.en: I'll give you a choice.
You can use your unique position for evil
translation.zh: 你可以利用自己的优势做坏事

translation.en: by killing the president, starting a war, and bringing this country to its knees...
translation.zh:
去刺杀总统 引发战争
陷这个国家于水深火热

translation.en: or you use it for good.
For me.
-By killing El Toro. -[in English] I just wanna go home.
translation.zh:
-去刺杀艾尔塔罗
-我只想回家

translation.en: -How is everything, Mr. Masovich? -It's great.
translation.zh:
-您还满意吗 马索维克先生？
-非常满意

translation.en: Paolo here has known me since I was five years old. Isn't that right?
translation.zh:
保罗从我五岁起
就认识我了 是不是？

translation.en: It has been my pleasure to serve you and to watch you grow into a strong man.
translation.zh:
很荣幸能服侍您
并看着您成长为强大的人

translation.en: My father hired him when we came to this country almost 40 years ago.
translation.zh:
大约40年前 我们刚到
这个国家时 我父亲雇佣了他

translation.en: Wow, that is so nice.
But he should have restocked the Zima.
translation.zh: 但他应该及时补充吉马

translation.en: I can find you in a second.
Don't let me down like Paolo.
translation.zh: 别像保罗一样 让我失望

translation.en: [agent] Oh, you're not gonna believe this.
-Is that Masovich's place? -You know what this means?
translation.zh: 这不是马索维克的宅邸吗？ 知道这意味着什么吗？

translation.en: -Double down on our bet? -Well, yeah.
But also, if he's met with two of the three kings of Caracas,
translation.zh:
既然他已经见过
加拉加斯三大要员中的两个

translation.en: we should probably tell the third.
translation.zh: 我们应该让他也见见第三个

translation.en: And I should probably download his book.
translation.zh: 我应该下载他的书看看

translation.en: You forget about me, bacon bits?
translation.zh: 你不认识我了吗 肉丁先生？

translation.en: So, Masovich must have had a chat with you
translation.zh: 马索维克肯定和你聊得不错吧

translation.en: and said you could leave the country. No strings attached.
translation.zh:
跟你说可以离开这里
不需要任何条件

translation.en: -Yeah, maybe one string. -Yeah, I know.
-I heard the whole thing. -Yeah? Well, I'm getting out of here.
translation.zh:
-我都听见了
-是吗？我要离开这里

translation.en: I just saw a man get murdered, actually, in the face.
translation.zh: 我刚亲眼见到一个人被一枪爆头

translation.en: -So, I'm going to the embassy. -Go ahead.
I promise you, you go in there, you will die.
translation.zh: 我能肯定 你进去 就是死路一条

translation.en: The guy's got eyes everywhere.
Even here.
[Rosa] He wants you to kill El Toro.
This is good.
But this is insane.
I'm not an assassin. Now I've got two contracts. Two.
translation.zh:
我根本不是刺客
现在却得到两份任务 两份

translation.en: How is this good?
Because it confirms Anton Masovich is protecting the president.
translation.zh: 这说明安东马索维克在保护总统

translation.en: All I have to do is prove it. And then I can have them both extradited.
translation.zh: 我只需证明这件事 那样我就能把他们两个都引渡走

translation.en: The president's all about the high life,
which Masovich is obviously financing with his drug business.
translation.zh: 马索维克在以贩毒收入向他行贿

translation.en: Look, if El Toro wants you to take out--
translation.zh: 既然艾尔塔罗想要干掉…

translation.en: Take out the president, why don't you help him do it?
translation.zh: 干掉总统 你为什么不帮他？

translation.en: Because, McRib, my job is to uphold the law, not break it.
translation.zh:
因为 猪柳堡 我的职责是
捍卫法律 不是知法犯法

translation.en: Do me a favor. Can you stop with the names?
translation.zh: 拜托 能不能别给我取绰号了？

translation.en: Sorry, I didn't know you were that sensitive.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不知道你这么敏感

translation.en: Yes. I am sensitive.
To dying. I'm different that way. My mother would be like,
translation.zh:
我怕死 我对死亡的态度
和别人不同 我妈妈会说

translation.en: "Why are you scared of death?" I don't know. I guess I'm allergic.
translation.zh:
“你为什么怕死？”
我也不知道 可能是我对死亡过敏

translation.en: It turns out I'm allergic. I'm allergic to death.
translation.zh: 原来是因为过敏 我对死亡过敏

translation.en: I understand. This is a scary place.
translation.zh: 我能理解 这里确实很可怕

translation.en: But if you wanna make it home alive, you've gotta get out of your head,
translation.zh: 但如果你想活着回家 就必须现实点

translation.en: and get in the game.
[in Spanish] He is here.
This guy has the attention of El Toro and Masovich?
translation.zh:
这个人引起了艾尔塔罗
和马索维克两个人的注意？

translation.en: Well, it seems that way, Mike.
Cut that Mike shit right now, slick.
It's either my real name or el presidente.
translation.zh: 要么叫我真名 要么叫我总统先生

translation.en: Relax, Miguel.
We all know you grew up in San Diego.
translation.zh: 我们都知道你在圣迭戈长大

translation.en: Maybe Masovich and El Toro believe this guy actually is legit.
translation.zh:
可能马索维克和艾尔塔罗
真以为这家伙是好人

translation.en: -Well, is he? -No.
-Look at him. -[Cueto] Mm-hm.
Well, we don't know that for certain.
[Ruiz] I will interrogate this Sam Larson.
translation.zh: 我去审问这个塞缪尔拉森

translation.en: It is, after all, a matter of national security.
translation.zh: 毕竟这属于国家安全问题

translation.en: Sí, sí. Have General Ruiz talk to him.
translation.zh: 对 让鲁伊兹将军和他谈谈

translation.en: Fine. But don't make any other moves.
translation.zh: 好 但别有什么动作

translation.en: We've all worked way too hard to maintain the balance of power in this dump.
translation.zh:
我们好不容易才维持住
这鬼地方的力量均势

translation.en: Dump?
Yeah. Dump.
Come on, Mike. You hate this place as much as we do.
translation.zh: 麦克 你跟我们一样讨厌这里

translation.en: I know, I know. But do you have to keep reminding me?
translation.zh:
我知道 可你们也不用
一直提醒我这件事吧？

translation.en: Yes.
This is the address to my safe house.
translation.zh: 这是我的藏身处的地址

translation.en: -I'll pick you up tomorrow. -Tomorrow?
Don't even think about going out. Masovich owns half the cops,
translation.zh: 别出屋 一半警察都是马索维克的人

translation.en: and controls the airport.
You can't risk being seen.
Yeah, but you've got backup, right?
I'm a one-woman operation.
I gotta believe the U.S. government knew what was happening--
translation.zh:
美国政府应该已经
知道这里的情况了吧…

translation.en: CIA wants to maintain the status quo. Nothing more.
translation.zh: 中情局只想维持现状 不会过多干涉

translation.en: I learned my first year down here that if I wanna do any good,
translation.zh:
我在这里工作第一年
就知道了 要想做对的事

translation.en: I have to do it myself.
Sounds kind of lonely.
[Juan] Don't worry.
It's on me.
Your gun. Now.
You're coming with me, Ghost.
-Juan, I'm sorry about locking you out. -Move.
translation.zh:
-胡安 很抱歉把你关在外面
-快走

translation.en: What if I don't?
-I said move. -Already moving.
[Rosa] Let's go.
I don't like to fight women.
I can see why.
Get in the game!
You and I aren't done yet.
Looks like we are.
You follow us and you die.
translation.zh: 你敢跟着 就杀了你

translation.en: -You're not gonna kill her. -I'm a freedom fighter, not a murderer.
translation.zh: 你不会杀她吧 我是自由战士 不是杀人狂

translation.en: But you said you'd murder me.
For you, I will make an exception.
[agent] Let Mike and General Ruiz know they just left Café Luna.
translation.zh:
通知麦克和鲁伊兹将军
他们刚离开露娜咖啡厅

translation.en: -Cleveland, look alive. Come on, man. -Sorry.
You know the Ghost was hired by the Brits in '88
translation.zh: 你知道幽灵在1988年被英国雇用

translation.en: to take out the leader of that last coup?
translation.zh: 去刺杀上次政变的领袖

translation.en: General Sanchez?
Actually, I didn't.
But I guess that makes sense. MI5 definitely wanted him gone.
translation.zh:
这倒是合乎情理
军情五处肯定想除掉他

translation.en: Well, either this guy had some crazy contacts...
translation.zh: 他要不就是认识特别厉害的人

translation.en: or he might actually be the real deal.
translation.zh: 要不就真的是个狠角色

translation.en: Just call General Ruiz.
Where are we going?
Back to El Toro's.
But I didn't have a chance to kill the president.
translation.zh: 但我还没找到机会刺杀总统

translation.en: We both know you won't.
translation.zh: 我们都知道你不会去行刺

translation.en: -That's not true. -It is.
You are a man of words, not of action.
I punched you.
-You punch like a small child. -It hurt you.
translation.zh:
-那拳像小朋友打的一样
-肯定打疼你了

translation.en: -It tickled. -No, no, no. I'm sorry, I saw your eyes,
translation.zh:
-像挠痒痒一样
-不 不好意思 我看到你的眼睛了

translation.en: they got all glassy, like you were about to cry.
translation.zh: 你泪眼朦胧 像要哭了似的

translation.en: -[in Spanish accent] "Like a small child." -I'll spank you like a small child.
translation.zh:
-“像小孩一样”
-小心我打你屁股

translation.en: [in normal voice] Oh, yeah? Why don't you try, and see what the Ghost does?
translation.zh:
是吗？你怎么不打？
看幽灵我会作何反应？

translation.en: -You are not the Ghost. -Really?
Where's your gun?
Like I said, all words.
translation.zh: 我说得没错 你只会说

translation.en: Oh... Maybe I am the Ghost--
God! Really?
Oh, man.
Now it is your eyes that are glassy.
What is it?
-[Juan] The army. -The army's bad?
translation.zh:
-是军方的人
-见到军方的人不好？

translation.en: When you're a rebel trying to overthrow the government,
translation.zh: 如果你是企图推翻政府的反叛者

translation.en: it doesn't get much worse.
-Come on. -All right.
-[Juan] We wait here till night falls. -But that's your truck across the street.
translation.zh: 我们天黑前待在这里 但你的车就在马路对面

translation.en: If they see us, they'll shoot us.
translation.zh: 他们发现的话 一定会开枪打死我们

translation.en: They find us here, they'll shoot us here. We gotta go to the truck.
translation.zh:
他们要是发现我们在这
也会打死我们 我们得到车那里去

translation.en: -Not a good idea. -Come on, Juan.
-Get out of your head, get in the game. -Hey!
-El baño, can I--? -[shushes]
[in English] Don't talk.
What is your involvement...
with El Toro...
and Anton Masovich?
[in English] Masovich wants me to kill El Toro. El Toro,
translation.zh:
马索维克要我
刺杀艾尔塔罗 而艾尔塔罗

translation.en: he wants me to kill the president.
Confusing, right? It's--
I wasn't gonna do it, by the way. I would never--
translation.zh: 我不会那么做的 我绝对不会…

translation.en: I wasn't gonna kill the president.
-It took El Toro long enough. -Excuse me?
translation.zh:
-艾尔塔罗这么久才决定
-什么？

translation.en: El Toro has been turning the people against the president for years.
translation.zh:
艾尔塔罗这些年一直
在鼓动大众反抗总统

translation.en: Let me guess.
He wanted you to do it at the inauguration ball.
translation.zh: 他要你在就职典礼现场刺杀总统

translation.en: Yes.
-So cliché. [chuckles] -I thought so, too.
-It felt a little on the nose, you know? -Listen.
translation.zh:
-太容易被猜到 是吧？
-听我说

translation.en: Mason, Ghost, whatever your name is.
translation.zh: 梅森 幽灵 随便你叫什么

translation.en: -Sam. My name is Sam. -Sam.
I had a tiny cat named Sam.
translation.zh: 我养了一只很小的猫也叫山姆

translation.en: That would be a kitten.
-In the States, we call it a kitten. -Kitten.
translation.zh:
-我们美国人管那叫猫仔
-猫仔

translation.en: Thank you.
Listen, Sam.
Forget all those offers.
The president needs you to help him take out Masovich.
translation.zh: 总统要你帮他除掉马索维克

translation.en: Masovich? I would have thought... El Toro-- I'm just lost.
translation.zh:
马索维克？我以为艾尔塔罗…
这到底是怎么回事

translation.en: I'm just--
If El Toro needs you, then he clearly can't get to the president on his own.
translation.zh:
艾尔塔罗要你去办
就证明他没办法刺杀总统

translation.en: Masovich, on the other hand, has had his claws in the president for years.
translation.zh:
另一方面 马索维克
多年来一直控制着总统

translation.en: The longer the president appeases Masovich,
translation.zh: 总统对马索维克让步的时间越久

translation.en: the greater the chance that he will be exposed and disgraced.
translation.zh: 就越可能东窗事发或者失势

translation.en: Yeah. [sighs]
I just wanna go home.
And I will get you home, if you do this.
translation.zh: 我会送你回家 只要你办成这件事

translation.en: Will you kill Masovich?
translation.zh: 你去不去刺杀马索维克？

translation.en: I really don't want to, so...
translation.zh: 我真的不想干 所以…

translation.en: Then you will be tried and executed
translation.zh: 那样的话 你就会被

translation.en: for plotting to assassinate the president of Venezuela.
translation.zh:
以阴谋刺杀委内瑞拉总统之罪
接受审判 被处死

translation.en: I'll do it, though, I mean...
I'm happy to hear that.
What is your plan?
I'll do it at the inauguration.
Really? Same place you were going to kill the president?
translation.zh:
真的吗？在你本来
要刺杀总统的地方？

translation.en: If everybody thinks I'm gonna kill the president,
translation.zh: 如果大家都以为我要刺杀总统

translation.en: no one will suspect my actual objective.
translation.zh: 就不会有人怀疑我的真实目标

translation.en: And with Masovich's bodyguards all outside during the party,
translation.zh:
宴会时马索维克的所有保镖
都会守在外面

translation.en: -he will be at his most vulnerable. -Are you sure it will work?
translation.zh:
-那时 最容易对他下手
-你确定能成功吗？

translation.en: Already did. Islamabad, '02.
translation.zh:
2002年在伊斯兰堡
就有过成功的先例了

translation.en: Afghan arms dealer never made it home from the state dinner.
translation.zh: 阿富汗军火商就在参加国宴时被杀了

translation.en: -[Ruiz] I like how you think. -He's talking about Chapter 12.
translation.zh:
-你的想法不错
-他说的是第12章的内容

translation.en: Why would an actual assassin write a book about being an assassin?
translation.zh:
真正的刺客
怎么会写自己的刺杀生涯？

translation.en: -It's beyond stupid. -Or is it so beyond stupid it's brilliant?
translation.zh: 那也太蠢了 或者这其实是非常明智的做法？

translation.en: No, it's just stupid. That's it.
Look, I'm taking this guy off the board, all right?
translation.zh: 听我说 我要让这家伙消失

translation.en: -I'm gonna go get the C-4. -Oh, don't start with the C-4.
We can't kill an American.
Well...
not directly.
[Anton] Traitor!
He is an international assassin.
Of course he's gonna go with the highest bidder.
translation.zh: 当然谁出价最高就替谁办事

translation.en: And right now, that's General Ruiz.
translation.zh: 现在 他是鲁伊兹将军的人

translation.en: You really should read his book.
I want every cop in the city looking for that pig.
translation.zh: 警察全体出动 去找那头猪

translation.en: And when they find him,
I want him to die a long, painful death.
-Understood. -[Anton] And tell Paolo
to bring me another Zima and clean this up.
translation.zh: 再给我拿一瓶吉马 把这里收拾干净

translation.en: You killed Paolo, jefe.
What the hell, Anton?
You can't just shoot someone in front of us.
translation.zh: 你怎么能当着我们的面杀人？

translation.en: At least wait until we leave.
Damn!
All right. Whole night's ruined.
[agent] That's just--
-Something is wrong with you. -[agent] I know.
-[Cleveland] In the head. -[agent] It's not even...
How did you get here? Did anyone spot you?
translation.zh: 你是怎么来的？你被发现了吗？

translation.en: Well, why don't you take a look at me,
and then take a look at everybody else who lives here?
translation.zh: 再看看还有谁住在这里？

translation.en: I'm gonna say, yeah, I think I was spotted.
translation.zh: 我想说 对 我应该被发现了

translation.en: [Sam] Here you go.
I could've done that myself.
I opened it for you. It's not a big thing.
translation.zh: 我帮你开了 没什么

translation.en: So, this is your case against Masovich, huh?
translation.zh: 这就是你对马索维克的调查？

translation.en: Five years of my life.
It looks a lot like my place.
Yeah, except the stuff on my walls is real.
translation.zh: 是 只不过我墙上的资料都是真实的

translation.en: Yeah? How's this for real?
I just met with the president's number one adviser.
translation.zh: 我刚见了总统的首席顾问

translation.en: -General Ruiz? -Mm-hm.
-How did you get a meeting with him? -How I get most of my meetings here.
translation.zh:
-你怎么会见到他？
-跟之前的经历一样

translation.en: I was abducted.
Guess who he wants me to eliminate at the inauguration ball.
translation.zh:
猜猜他想让我
在就职典礼上干掉什么人

translation.en: [whispers] Masovich.
-Bingo-vich. -[Rosa chuckles]
[Sam] So, I gotta ask, why are you so obsessed with taking down Masovich?
translation.zh:
我必须问
你为什么这么想除掉马索维克？

translation.en: The country would be a lot better off with him behind bars and...
translation.zh: 他坐牢的话 国家会更好

translation.en: -President Cueto out of power. -I mean, why you?
translation.zh:
-奎托总统就会失势
-你为什么有这种想法？

translation.en: Because my parents grew up here.
translation.zh: 因为我父母从小在这里长大

translation.en: Because the DEA assumed I'd fail.
translation.zh: 因为缉毒局不相信我会成功

translation.en: And honestly, because if I don't do it...
translation.zh: 老实讲 因为如果我不去做这件事

translation.en: -who will? -It just--
It just seems so dangerous, you know? You're down here by yourself and--
translation.zh: 感觉很危险 你懂吗？ 你孤军奋战

translation.en: Is it really worth risking your life?
translation.zh: 这真值得你冒生命危险吗？

translation.en: We're all gonna die.
Not all of us get to make a difference.
translation.zh: 不是所有人都能成就大事

translation.en: I know I certainly haven't.
If I could get the president to admit, on tape,
to ordering the hit on Masovich,
I could probably get them to turn against each other.
Maybe get one of them to flip.
translation.zh: 也许能让他们中的一个倒戈

translation.en: You're definitely gonna get yourself killed.
[Rosa] I'm not talking about me.
You.
Tomorrow night at the inauguration, wearing a wire.
translation.zh: 明晚参加就职典礼时 装上窃听器

translation.en: -Oh, no, no, no. -This could be your chance
to start making a difference.
I promise...
I won't let anything happen to you.
-My shoulder! -Get down!
[Sam] I got shot! I got shot!
What about not letting anything happen to me? I'm dying. I'm dying.
translation.zh:
你刚才不是还说
不会让我出危险吗？我要死了

translation.en: -You're not dying. Shut up! -You shut--
-Ever been shot before? -Yeah, twice.
Yeah, I got shot square. Okay, I'm definitely dying.
translation.zh: 我连中两枪 我真的要死了

translation.en: I can't feel my thumb.
-What the hell? -Go!
[Rosa] Come on.
Let's go.
No!
[Rosa] Hurry up!
Come on. I've got a go-bag at the mission.
translation.zh: 跟我走 我在收容所放了一个冲锋包

translation.en: So, let me guess.
The hero from your book used that trick with the lamp.
translation.zh: 你书中的英雄用过灯的那招

translation.en: Well, no.
The last actuary table I ran was on home electrical fires.
translation.zh:
我最后做的保险精算表
是关于家用电器起火的

translation.en: So, we can thank Trent's d-pic. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 这多亏了特伦特的黄图

translation.en: That sounds very, very weird.
Um... 'Cause you don't know Trent. And it's weird on its own.
translation.zh:
你都不认识特伦特
这件事本身也很奇怪

translation.en: [stammers] Wouldn't a hospital be better?
translation.zh: 去医院治疗会不会好点？

translation.en: Can't go to a hospital. [sighs]
You don't get it, do you?
Those guys were cops.
Masovich owns this city.
translation.zh: 整个城市都在马索维克的掌控下

translation.en: I wasn't joking when I said the DEA wrote me off.
translation.zh: 缉毒局无视我的事 是真的

translation.en: I've been down here on my own forever.
I don't have any more resources. That was my last safe house.
translation.zh: 我已经弹尽粮绝了 刚才那是我最后一个藏身处

translation.en: Well, then, how would I be getting to the inauguration?
translation.zh: 就职典礼我们该怎么办？

translation.en: What are you talking about?
I'll do it.
I'll wear a wire.
No, you were right. It's too dangerous. We gotta get you out of here.
translation.zh:
不 你说得对 那太危险
我们该想办法帮你逃出去

translation.en: -Mission's over. -Mission is not over.
-The Ghost doesn't just walk away. -You are not the Ghost.
translation.zh:
-幽灵不会就这么走了
-你不是幽灵

translation.en: You said, "Get out of your head and get in the game."
translation.zh: 你说的“认清现实 投入战斗”

translation.en: Sam, we almost died tonight.
translation.zh: 山姆 我们今晚差点丧命

translation.en: We're all gonna die.
Not all of us get to make a difference.
translation.zh: 不是所有人都能干一番大事

translation.en: We'd need a small army to protect us while we got ready.
translation.zh:
我们准备好后
需要一支小规模军队保护我们

translation.en: I think I know where to find one.
Tell El Toro the Ghost is here.
translation.zh: 通报艾尔塔罗 幽灵来了

translation.en: It is the Ghost.
The one and only.
And you, who is this?
Rosa Bolivar.
DEA, idealist, patriot.
translation.zh:
缉毒局的
是个理想主义者兼爱国人士

translation.en: She's a badass. She's a big fan of yours, too.
translation.zh: 她是个狠角色 也特别崇拜你

translation.en: -You know? Yeah. -Seems very nice.
[groans] My shoulder, man! I got shot.
translation.zh: 我的肩膀 老兄 我中枪了

translation.en: [in English] I have thousands of followers all over Venezuela,
translation.zh: 我在委内瑞拉的追随者众多

translation.en: but I cannot think of anybody as beautiful as you.
translation.zh: 但没有一个像你这样迷人

translation.en: Yes. Muy bonita, we get it. Okay. Let's focus on what's important.
translation.zh:
是 很漂亮 我们明白
好了 先说重点

translation.en: Yours truly just received a personal invite to...
a certain black-tie event.
translation.zh: 去参加一场非常正式的活动

translation.en: You see? What did I tell you?
That's right, Juan.
The plan is in motion.
Tomorrow I'll be in position to take out el presidente.
translation.zh: 明天我会找机会干掉总统

translation.en: But there is one catch.
-Anton Masovich is trying to kill us. -The Russian Moby?
translation.zh:
-安东马索维克要杀我们
-那个俄罗斯黑帮老大？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Screw him.
If you want me to take out the president, I need your men to keep us alive.
translation.zh:
你想让我杀掉总统
就得派人保证我的安全

translation.en: -Anything for you, friend. -Yeah.
-Anything. -All right.
Anything for you. Come.
We got our small army.
Let's get you ready for the ball, Cinderella.
translation.zh: 好好为晚会做准备吧 小公主

translation.en: No one's gonna be able to bring a weapon into the palace, so...
translation.zh: 总统官邸不允许携带武器进入

translation.en: if you can steal one of these from the presidential guard, use it.
translation.zh:
若你能从总统卫队的人手中
偷到武器 就好好利用

translation.en: Let's see.
-You're a good shot. -I've spent time at the range.
translation.zh:
-你的枪法不错
-我常在靶场练射击

translation.en: Don't get me wrong.
You're good, but you're not as good as me.
translation.zh: 你的枪法不错 但还不及我

translation.en: -Oh, really? -Yeah, really.
Why don't you try this on?
Okay, that's really cool.
-But not practical. -No, you could use that in the field.
translation.zh:
-但是不实用
-不 实战中可以用

translation.en: -Bullshit. -I used it in my book.
-Sam, what we're about to do is-- -I know.
translation.zh:
-山姆 我们将要执行的任务…
-我知道

translation.en: -It's not a book. -Let's just call it a night.
translation.zh:
-这不是书中的故事
-今晚就练到这里吧

translation.en: Wait a second.
-You're worried about me. -No.
Yeah.
That's why you're a one-woman operation.
Why you push people away with the nicknames.
translation.zh: 给人取绰号 让别人讨厌你

translation.en: If you're on your own, you don't have to worry about losing anyone.
translation.zh:
如果你单独行动
就不必担心会失去同伴

translation.en: You can't get hurt.
How did you know?
I'm a writer.
I notice the details.
It was just really hard when my first partner died.
translation.zh: 我第一个搭档牺牲时 我真的很难过

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
Then I lost two more in just one year.
translation.zh: 后来 一年之内又牺牲了两人

translation.en: Three?
Three of them died?
I mean, three here.
But before that, I lost two while I was on assignment in Mexico.
translation.zh:
在那之前 我在墨西哥
执行任务时 也牺牲了两个搭档

translation.en: [stammers] Five of your partners, they're dead? Five of them?
translation.zh: 你的五名搭档 都牺牲了？ 五个都死了？

translation.en: They call me the jinx back in D.C. No one will work with me.
translation.zh:
在华盛顿局里的人都说我是扫把星
没人愿意跟我搭档

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey.
-Come on, don't cry. -Everyone who touches me dies.
You're messing with me, aren't you?
Thought you noticed the details.
[sighs] You are good.
Hell, yeah, I am. Pack this up.
Let's go.
[in Spanish] As requested.
Turns out she's been trying to bring down Masovich for years.
translation.zh: 原来她一直想扳倒马索维克

translation.en: [in English] My kind of gal.
[man] They disappeared into the jungle.
Two of our men tried to follow them, but they were gunned down.
translation.zh:
我的两个手下
想追上他们 但被射杀了

translation.en: El Toro.
I pay you a lot of money, and you have failed me again.
translation.zh:
我给你们那么多钱
你们竟然又让我失望

translation.en: Next time I see the Ghost and that DEA bitch...
translation.zh:
下次让我见到幽灵
和那个缉毒局的贱人

translation.en: I'm gonna kill 'em myself.
-Thank you. -[El Toro speaking Spanish] De nada.
[in English] Let's get a move on, cupcake.
From my private collection.
Listen, I know you don't need the luck.
But I will say break a leg.
translation.zh:
但我还是要说
打断一条腿

translation.en: The president's leg.
Then, his other leg.
translation.zh: 然后再打断他另一条腿

translation.en: And then, carefully but painfully, rip out his still beating heart,
translation.zh:
然后再慢慢 狠狠地
揪出他还在跳动的心脏

translation.en: and hoist it above his corpse like this for the entire party to see.
translation.zh:
把心脏高悬在他的尸体上
让全场人都看到

translation.en: I was thinking something maybe quicker.
translation.zh: 我想用更利落点的方式

translation.en: Whatever works for you.
Until next we meet.
I can do that myself.
I opened it for you. It's not a big thing.
translation.zh: 我帮你开了 没什么

translation.en: Stay close to them.
Let me know when it is done.
Tonight... we take back our country.
translation.zh: 今晚 我们将收复我们的国家

translation.en: It's my country.
Isn't El Toro gonna be pissed when I don't do what I said?
translation.zh:
我不按说的那么做
艾尔塔罗会不会生气？

translation.en: Once the president's prosecuted, his corruption's exposed,
translation.zh: 一旦总统被揭发 他的腐败行迹暴露

translation.en: El Toro will thank you.
Testing, testing. Uno, dos, tres.
translation.zh:
测试…
一 二 三

translation.en: [Rosa on recording] Testing, testing. Uno, dos, tres.
translation.zh:
测试…
一 二 三

translation.en: Remember, I need the president confessing to ordering the hit on Masovich.
translation.zh:
记住 我要总统供认
曾命人谋杀马索维克

translation.en: -Is that all? -Don't get killed.
-Like my other five partners. -You were messing with me.
translation.zh:
-像我其他五个搭档那样
-你昨晚骗我

translation.en: Was I?
Don't you start with that.
You go left, I'll go right.
translation.zh: 你去左边 我去右边

translation.en: Locate the president, and meet back here before you make contact.
translation.zh: 找到总统 和他对话前 回这里见我

translation.en: I trust all is proceeding to plan.
translation.zh: 一切都在按计划进行吧

translation.en: Tomorrow our Russian friend won't be feeling very good.
translation.zh: 明天我们的俄罗斯朋友要遭罪了

translation.en: Because he'll be dead.
That's what I was going for, yeah.
So clumsy of me.
I think I've had one too many.
Thank you, my friend.
Anton.
Let's dance.
I thought you'd never ask.
translation.zh: 我以为你不会邀我跳舞

translation.en: Thank you.
[Juan] I'll take that, sir.
Juan.
How did you get in?
-I'm more capable than El Toro thinks. -I'm glad you're here, man.
translation.zh:
-艾尔塔罗不了解我的实力
-你能在这里 真是太好了

translation.en: -I'm freaking out. -You will kill the president tonight.
translation.zh:
-我好紧张
-你今晚必须杀死总统

translation.en: -Yeah, of course. -Otherwise, I will.
translation.zh:
-我当然会
-你不动手 我就动手

translation.en: And then I'll kill you.
Come on, man. Oh, come on now. Kylie.
translation.zh: 快点 赶快发给 凯丽

translation.en: [mutters] If you don't hear from me, I'm so gonna die.
translation.zh:
没有我的消息就说明我死了 （凯丽…没有我的消息
就说明我已经死在了委内瑞拉）

translation.en: [Anton] Tango.
The vertical expression of a horizontal act.
translation.zh: 是一种表达爱意的舞步

translation.en: -Hello. -Ghost Face Killer.
Got your text.
-You're kidding, right? -Kylie, it's not a good time.
translation.zh:
-你在开玩笑吧？
-凯丽 我现在没空开玩笑

translation.en: -Unh! -I'll get you horizontal, but in a box.
translation.zh: 你去棺材里感受爱意吧

translation.en: I forgot to ask.
Where's the manuscript for your next book?
[Sam] Oh, no.
I can't do this right now.
Shall we take this upstairs?
Ooh. You about to assassinate someone?
I gotta go.
[Sam] I gotta go.
Could this guy be more of a mouth breather?
Well, I think his everyday Joe appearance is all a part of his cover.
translation.zh: 我认为他愚蠢的表象都是伪装的

translation.en: Think about it. You'd never suspect a guy who looks like that is an assassin.
translation.zh: 你想 谁会怀疑这样一个人会是刺客

translation.en: Which makes him the perfect assassin.
translation.zh: 这样才方便进行暗杀活动

translation.en: You think this guy's the Ghost?
translation.zh: 你真的认为他就是幽灵？

translation.en: I'll bet you a year's salary he kills the president tonight.
translation.zh: 我赌一年工资 他今晚会杀掉总统

translation.en: -Easiest 17 grand I ever made. -Yeah.
Mr. President.
A fellow American. How nice.
translation.zh: 见到美国来的朋友 真好

translation.en: Don't you just hate the food here? I mean, it's all Mexican.
translation.zh:
这里的饭菜是不是很难吃？
都是墨西哥菜

translation.en: Man, I would just kill for some of them mini hot dogs right about now.
translation.zh: 为了迷你热狗我可以去杀人

translation.en: Hey, Juan.
You know him?
I call them all Juan. Half the time, I'm right.

translation.en: Juan Valdez, go to the kitchen.
translation.zh: 胡安瓦尔迪兹 快去厨房

translation.en: Order me up some of them pigs in a blanket.
translation.zh: 让他们给我做那种夹香肠的薄烤饼

translation.en: [in English] I know you.
I do.
You're that author that Katie Couric outed.
translation.zh: 凯蒂柯丽克采访的那本书的作者

translation.en: Man, you, you and Sarah Palin.
That KC, she's the real assassin, huh?
translation.zh:
那个尤物 她真的是名刺客
是吧？

translation.en: Have you seen the Auto-Tune they did of your interview on YouTube?
translation.zh:
你看没看过Youtube视频网站上
你的访谈节目的电音版？

translation.en: No, but you know what?
Maybe you have an office you can show me?
translation.zh: 你有没有办公室 能放给我看？

translation.en: Dude, yes. Come.
Will this work?
I hope they can get blood out of the carpet.
translation.zh: 地毯上沾到血 希望能洗干净

translation.en: Mr. President, I was hoping to talk to you about Anton Masovich.
translation.zh:
总统先生 我想和你谈谈
安东马索维克的事

translation.en: [in English] I made sure I had Zima for that little pain in the ass.
translation.zh:
我必须给那个
令人头疼的家伙准备吉马

translation.en: Man, I so hate all of this.
There are times when I really wanna put a gun in my mouth.

translation.en: Have you had a job like that, americano?
translation.zh:
你做过这种
让人想死的工作吗 美国佬？

translation.en: Actually, I did.
I wish you'd take a bribe like the others.
translation.zh: 你怎么不和其他人一样 收受贿赂

translation.en: Sorry, I'm not that kind of girl.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不是那种人

translation.en: Gracias, put down.
I'm starving.
Juan.
[in English] Of course, señor.
What if I could make your Masovich problem go away?
translation.zh:
也许我能帮你解决
马索维克这个困扰？

translation.en: [in English] Pig?
You mean, like, go away forever?
translation.zh: 你是说 彻底解决吗？

translation.en: Just say the word.
I don't care you're a woman.
I'm still gonna kill you.
Good to know you're an equal opportunity douche bag.

translation.en: [in Spanish] There's a disturbance outside.
[in Spanish] Find the president. Who was with him?

translation.en: He was last seen with a Mr. Mason Carver.

translation.en: He flipped. He's trying to kill the president!

translation.en: [in English] Didn't General Ruiz already talk to you about this?

translation.en: -Talk to me about what? -The thing.
-What thing? -The thing.
The thing that you're asking me about.
I was asking you about...
-what? -About our little friend.
Which one?
Masovich. [laughs]
-Oh. So, you're saying, if I'm clear-- -[shouting] I want you to kill Masovich!

-你的意思是 如果我清楚…
-我要你去杀了马索维克！

translation.en: -What is wrong with you? -Nothing is wrong.
-Everything is great in the world. -Wait.
-Sorry? -Is that a wire?
-Huh? -In your shirt there. No, there.
-No, no. No, no. No, no. -No?
[Sam] No, no, no. No, no, no. It's an iPhone headset.

translation.en: -But I see it in your shirt. -[Sam] It's a music--
translation.zh:
-我看到它就在你的衬衫里
-这是听音乐的…

translation.en: [Cueto] No!
That...
is definitely a wire.
[Anton] Come on!
It's okay.
It is?
[Cueto] Yeah, it's okay.
I knew...
that this was gonna happen eventually. That I would get caught.
Man, I hate this place.
I so miss San Diego and the perfect weather.
translation.zh: 我好怀念圣迭戈 还有那里的好天气

translation.en: Instead, I'm stuck with this.
And I can't get out.
I hate all of this. I hate the people, I hate the food. I...
translation.zh:
这里的一切都让我恶心
我讨厌这里的人 讨厌这里的食物

translation.en: hate that lion, the way it looks at me. And I hate soccer.
translation.zh:
我讨厌那头狮子看我的样子
我讨厌足球

translation.en: Go Padres.
I hate my life.
And most of all...
I hate myself.
Hey.
Hey, hey, hey.
This is not the end of the world.
Lift your head up, and you look at me.

translation.en: Now, I'm telling you, I got caught doing something wrong, too.

translation.en: But I'm gonna tell you, I am a better person now.
Okay, you can still make a difference.
It's too late for that.
That's a big misconception.
I'm-- Oh, my God, that's a gun.
No, please. No, no, stop, please. No!
Oh, this is bad.
This is very bad.
-Help! -You shot him?
-No! -Is he dead?
-I think he's still breathing. -You!
What do I do?
I don't know. CPR?
translation.zh: 不知道 做心肺复苏？

translation.en: I don't know CPR!
How do you not know? You know everything.
translation.zh:
你怎么能不会心肺复苏术？
你什么都知道

translation.en: Yeah, about taking lives, not saving them.

translation.en: Give me the gun.
Hey! Hey! Hey!
Say good night, bitch!
Good night, bitch.
Arrest that man for the assassination of President Cueto.

translation.en: I didn't do anything. I did not do it.
translation.zh:
我什么都没做
我什么都没做

translation.en: He did it.
That son of a bitch actually did it.
translation.zh: 那个混蛋竟然真的刺杀成功

translation.en: Pay up.
[in Spanish] It is done.
[in Spanish] The president...
is dead.
[men chanting in Spanish ] ¡El Toro!
¡El Toro! ¡El Toro! ¡El Toro!
[in English] Ghost, you did it.
-El Toro, what are you doing here? -There is nothing to worry about.
translation.zh:
-艾尔塔罗 你怎么在这里？
-别担心 朋友

translation.en: I have made a deal with General Ruiz.
translation.zh: 我和鲁伊兹将军达成了协议

translation.en: And Juan here, he has something to tell you.
Oh. No, no, hey.
-We don't need to do this. -Tell him.
Tell him.
I doubted you the whole time, but...
I was wrong.
You are... him.
Him who?
-The Ghost. -[El Toro] Yes, the Ghost.
And as to you, Agent Bolivar,
translation.zh: 至于你 波利娃特工

translation.en: I hope he was right when he said that you are a patriot.
translation.zh:
希望他说的
你是个爱国主义者 说得没错

translation.en: Will you help me make a real difference here?
translation.zh: 你要帮我改变这个国家吗？

translation.en: -I will. -[El Toro] Fantastic.
Juan is gonna take you up to the compound and bring you up to speed.
translation.zh: 胡安会带你去基地 汇报情况

translation.en: Your input will be very valuable to me.
-Thank you. -[speaking Spanish] De nada.
[in English] Juan, please, take her.
And you, my friend.
You will ride with me.
For we have much to talk about.
Wow. So, this is a revolution, huh?
Man, I'm really starting to like Venezuela.
translation.zh: 我有点喜欢委内瑞拉了

translation.en: -Maybe I'll even get a timeshare. -[gun cocks]
Or not.
Either way.
I'm really sorry to do this, Fantasma.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我必须这么做 幽灵

translation.en: What--?
What about the whole us-riding-together thing?
translation.zh: 你不是和我称兄道弟吗？

translation.en: You know too much. Now you must die. But...
translation.zh: 你知道得太多了 必须得死

translation.en: you will live in our hearts and minds forever.
translation.zh: 但你会永远活在我们的心中

translation.en: But I'll be dead.
But you will live forever.
translation.zh: 但你会永远活在我们心中

translation.en: You will be a legend. We will write songs about you.
translation.zh: 你会成为传说 我们会歌颂你

translation.en: But I won't be here.
Murals will be painted in your honor.
Children will be singing and dancing in the street,
translation.zh: 孩子们会在街上歌唱舞蹈

translation.en: praising your name.
-I understand that-- -You will be an icon of the revolution,
translation.zh:
-我明白你的意思…
-你将成为革命象征

translation.en: -worshiped for generations to come. -Yes, but I will be dead.
Yes, you will be dead.
[Cleveland] Put the weapon down, El Toro.
translation.zh: 放下武器 艾尔塔罗

translation.en: CIA.
CIA.
We're part of the deal with your buddy, Ruiz.
translation.zh: 我们和你的好兄弟鲁伊兹商量好了

translation.en: And I'm gonna need this one alive.
-I need him dead. -[Cleveland] Actually, you don't.
State Department just called.
Sam Larson's getting a free pass home.
translation.zh: 要我们送山姆拉森回国

translation.en: We're as shocked as you are.
But he knows too much. He will tell everyone.
translation.zh: 可他知道得太多 他会说出去

translation.en: -No one's gonna believe him. He's a fraud. -[El Toro] Wait.
translation.zh: 没人会信他 他是个骗子 等等

translation.en: A fraud? What do you mean?
His book. It was bullshit.
translation.zh: 他的书 都是瞎编的

translation.en: He's not the Ghost.
He's just some... loser.
translation.zh: 他只是个一事无成的人

translation.en: I tried to tell you.
You lied to me?
No, you-- You just assumed, you know.
translation.zh: 没有 你… 是你以为我是

translation.en: I was gonna write songs about you.
All right. Let's go.
-[agent] That's enough. -Beautiful songs!
Okay, if he starts singing, shoot him.
Got it.
[Sam] Something about this doesn't feel right.
You're telling me.
Who do you know in the State Department?
translation.zh: 你认识国务院的什么人？

translation.en: I'm talking about Rosa.
I mean, if El Toro was gonna kill me, how do I know she's gonna be all right?
translation.zh: 艾尔塔罗要杀我 她怎么会没事？

translation.en: She probably won't be.
You guys are gonna help her out, right?
She's DEA. Different team.
translation.zh: 她属于缉毒局 不是我们的人

translation.en: -But she's making a difference. -She's making a mess.
translation.zh:
-可她在努力改变现状
-她搞得一团糟

translation.en: [agent] Why do you think we made the last DEA agent assigned here eat a C-4 sandwich?
translation.zh:
不然你觉得我们为什么
会害死上一个缉毒局特工？

translation.en: My parents died when I was a little boy.
translation.zh: 我很小时 父母双亡

translation.en: In many ways, El Toro has been like a father to me.
translation.zh: 艾尔塔罗对我来说就像父亲一样

translation.en: Just as you will be to all of our people.
This country needs a change.
[El Toro] Yes, it does.
Thanks for waiting.
If you actually want my help...
it was worth the wait.
I can assure you that my plans won't work without you.
translation.zh: 我保证 我的计划不能没有你的参与

translation.en: Let's go. Don't look at him. Come on.
translation.zh: 走 别看他 快走

translation.en: I read the book. Real page-turner.
translation.zh: 我读了你的书 内容非常引人入胜

translation.en: Your flight leaves in 20 minutes. Get on it, and never come back.
translation.zh:
你的航班20分钟后起飞
上了飞机 再也别回来

translation.en: No.
I'm not leaving until I know Rosa's okay.
translation.zh: 不确定罗莎安然无恙 我就不走

translation.en: You might not have her back, but I do.
translation.zh: 你们不去救她 我去

translation.en: -Why? -Because she had mine.
-Whoa. -What? You wanna stop me?
This is going to the New York Times.
translation.zh: 我马上把这个发给《纽约时报》

translation.en: [agent on recording] Why do you think we made the last DEA agent
translation.zh: 不然你觉得我们为什么会害死 上一个缉毒局特工？

translation.en: assigned here eat a C-4 sandwich?
You know, Larson, you may have everybody else fooled,
translation.zh: 拉森 你可能把所有人都骗了

translation.en: but we both know you're a fake.
translation.zh: 但你我都清楚 你是个冒牌货

translation.en: So, get your ass on that plane,
and back to writing other people's stories.
translation.zh: 回去继续写别人的故事

translation.en: Or...
I could start living my own.
translation.zh: 我可以开始自己的人生

translation.en: Final chapter. You rot in jail.
translation.zh: 最后一章 你得坐一辈子牢

translation.en: [Cleveland] Get everyone back. Official government business.
translation.zh: 大家后退 警察办案

translation.en: Keys.
Final chapter. I save the girl.
translation.zh: 最后一章 我救了她

translation.en: You know...
-he might actually be the Ghost. -Heh.
[El Toro] Masovich was a very smart businessman.
translation.zh: 马索维克是个聪明的生意人

translation.en: He kept a very tight lid on his drug trafficking routes.
translation.zh: 他把毒品走私的路径都隐藏得很好

translation.en: So much so that General Ruiz didn't even know how he did it.

所以就连鲁伊兹将军
都不知道他到底是怎样贩毒的

translation.en: But you...
You are the woman that has been studying him for five years.
Watching every move that he makes.
So, you know it all.
You know.
Just like you know
that he ran a billion-dollar business.
translation.zh: 他掌握着价值数十亿的生意

translation.en: An empire...
that I am going to run.
And you are going to help me.
